summary: A prince falls in love with a princess cursed to change into a swan by day, but their love is threatened by the sorcerer who keeps her imprisoned.
cast: Keiko Takeshita|Tarô Shigaki|Asao Koike|Yôko Asagami|Yoneko Matsukane|Fuyumi Shiraishi|Taeko Nakanishi|Akira Murayama|Mugihito|Jôji Yanami|Chiyoko Kawashima|Seiko Nakano|Takuo Nody|Christopher Atkins|Pam Dawber|Kay Lenz|David Hemmings|Nancy Link|Steve Knode|Joseph Zucatti|Patricia Kobayashi|Gerri Sorrells|Nancy Culluci|Judy Sackheim|Don Johnson|Greg Starr|Mike Worman|Helen Kataoka|Debbie Davidson|Donna Zucatti|Robert Axelrod|Ardwight Chamberlain|Louise Chamis|Lara Cody|Theodore Lehmann
keywords: fairy tale|folklore|folktale|based on ballet|based on folktale
title: El lago de los cisnes
